title: Learn Morse Code for Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
developerAddress:
4483 N. Edgemoor Ct
Bel Aire KS 67220
description: An app for your Android Wear watch to help you learn morse code. It displays the letters of the alphabet with a memorable way to view the morse code for each letter, and taps out the morse code on your wrist using the vibrate feature of the watch.
descriptionHTML: An app for your Android Wear watch to help you learn morse code. It displays the letters of the alphabet with a memorable way to view the morse code for each letter, and taps out the morse code on your wrist using the vibrate feature of the watch.
comments: Doesn't seem to work Really like the idea but when I mimic the code it just vibrates continuously in random patterns then shows a cross and the app closes, had potential.
I've really wanted to learn Morse code! And now with this app on my watch I just might be able to do so!
Simple The app has a simple interface and is very easy to use! Great job!

Almost Great, but utter fail Every time I look at a letter I get a vibration. I don't want that and can't turn it off. It'd be nice if there was a 'show me' area that would do the vibration, and a 'try me' area where you could practice them.
